p: Immunomodulation is the process of moderating an immune response by administration of a chemical. The modulatory effects of several medicinal plants on cytokines and eventually, on the immune system were shown to be mediated through stimulation or suppression of various components of the immune system including the innate and adaptive immune responses (Spelman et al. 2006); immunomodulatory properties of A. cepa and its constituents have been widely evaluated by several studies (Spelman et al. 2006).
